id: {Player} ask the traveling caravan about any happenings nearby

onSuccess.displayText:
{Player} decided it would be wise to gather some information before setting out.
“There's a madman roaming the forest,” one of the merchants said. “Attacking travelers, soldiers, anyone who crosses his path. Claims he's some kind of ‘anti-Angel' rather bold, if you ask me. He even attacked our caravan after finding out where we were heading. That's why we stopped here; one of our wagon wheels was broken during the attack”.
